title: Problem with Casting 2nd part of Orn Ult
body:
When playing Ornn the animation for his ult approaching Ornn seems to be out of sync with where the game thinks it should be.  When I go to recast the ult the Ram is already well past me.  Recasting the ult very early manages to get a hit.  

Is it something with my setup?

replies.body: This might be happening due to some of the ghost game issues we've seen today. I'm gonna be testing this for quite a bit myself in a few minutes to see if I can confirm this on my end, but you're welcome to help me out by trying to get a replay of that happening in action. If you're able to get a clip of it, go ahead and post it over in [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) to get the devs attention!
